channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Diddy Juror Denies That Celebrity Status Influenced Verdict: ‘We Would Have Treated Any Defendant in the Same Manner’
item.description: Diddy juror shuts down the rumors! 🙌 Celeb status had no impact on the verdict. Fair play all the way! 🎶 #MusicNews

item.title: Watch Lana Del Rey & Addison Rae Sing Together At Wembley Stadium
item.description: 🌟 Lana Del Rey and Addison Rae rock the mic at Wembley Stadium! 🎤 Who knew this duo would sound so 🔥 together? #MusicMagic

item.title: Chance the Rapper, Lil Wayne, and Smino Link Up for New Song and Video “Tree”: Watch
item.description: 🔥🎶 Get ready to vibe with Chance the Rapper, Lil Wayne, and Smino in their new music video "Tree"! 🌳 Watch now! #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Charley Crockett Shares Song From New Album Dollar a Day: Listen
item.description: 🎶 Groove into the weekend with @CharleyCrockett's fresh tune from Dollar a Day album! 🎸💥 #NewMusicFriday

item.title: JID Announces New Mixtape Out Tomorrow, Shares “Beau” & “32 (Freestyle)”
item.description: 🎶 Tomorrow just got better! 🚀 Get ready to vibe with @JIDsv's new mixtape dropping soon! Which track are you most excited for? 💥 #NewMusicAlert
